title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: Uvog Women's Draped Front Open Cardigan Casual Long Sleeve Lightweight Cardigans Sweaters Duster

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #21,778 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #150 in Women's Cardigans

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Cardigans

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely recommend this item
items.body: I have purchased this item is black and navy blue. They are comfortable, versatile and light weight. I work in the administrative field and have often worn business jackets to accessorize my workday outfits. When the weather is warmer, I feel the need to wear lighter material. Once, I decided to replace my jackets, I choose these cardigan sweaters. I feel that I have made a great decision by choosing these items. They are light weight, fits great, required minimal amount of ironing if at all, they wash well in the machine and best of all, they can be worn with any attire. I just wish that they come in more colors. I have worn they on very hot days, and still kept very cool. Whats not to like about them. Oh, they look good on me Read more
items.author: Laura P. Jones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect coverage cardigan
items.body: Exceptional cardigan. I love that it covers everything in the front and back. Just what I was looking for. Wish they made it in velour too. Read more
items.author: None

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Open Tunic Cardigan
items.body: Material was very good and looked very good. Material is lightweight which is what I wanted. A little lighter than a sweater but good for A/C. Would buy again in different color. Read more
items.author: Customer JTA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: Looks great & fits perfectly. Soft fabric, light weight & comfortable. Would recommend this item. May order other colors. Read more
items.author: S. Luna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Purple-Red Summer Cardigan
items.body: The fabric is lightweight, silky soft and comfy. The sewing is excellent and fits me correctly and comfortably. I love the color; it is a beautiful summer cardigan. I will definitely buy the same cardigan again, only in a different color. It is not see-through; it is opaque which is what I wanted. Read more
items.author: Ms. P.S.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cardigan
items.body: Very thin and clingy fabric. Returned this item Read more
items.author: Rebecca Mayer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great
items.body: Fits and hangs great Read more
items.author: V. Sims

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight. True to size
items.body: This is great to have especially living in Mississippi when it is chilly in the morning and hot at lunch. Just the right weight Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Grey, L-navy, Black, Camel, Rose Red, Oliver Green, Beige, Royal Blue, New Khaki, Sky Blue, Blue, Dark Pink, Hot Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
